name: Brewing Tranquility
description:
Currently in Early Access Pre Pre Pre Alpha!

Honobono-style game about brewing drinks on a tropical island. 

  • Ferment non-alcoholic beverages from all over the world. 
  • Harvest ingredients from the nearby forest.
  • Buy and Barter with your fellow residents.

Made for  The Tea Cafe Game Jam

Developed in Godot
